endpoints.title: Create a new build
endpoints.details: This will create a new build for the `com.example.myapp` package. If you never created a build for this package before, the initial build number will be `1`.

endpoints.title: Create a new build and return its build number in plain text
endpoints.details: This is useful for bash scripts, since you can just store the request output in a variable.

endpoints.title: Create a new build with additional information
endpoints.details: You can pass a JSON-encoded meta data dictionary for your build. You can retrieve this data later when querying a specific build.

endpoints.title: Get a specific build by its build number
